title: black screen on my phone. i can squeeze for google assistant, slow respond but still vibrates back
content:
hi! 3-4 days ago my phone screen starting going all black. i googled the issue and  i did recovery mode reset that night, and it fixed the black screen issue for that night. the screen went black again the next day, but then i figured, if i only click power button once and be patient about it, the screen will light up is like 10 sec then i can use fingerprint to unlock. but it died again now i cant get it back on.
now i cant hold power button and volume down to reset no matter how long i hold the buttons.
the google assistant squeezy is still vibrating back (but really slow)
i think i notice the phone vibrates when i got a messenger text
it still wanna connect to my laptop via cable
there is no screen flashes
i cant ring the phone through find my phone app (i'm not sure if my wifi setting is on or off)
i'm a little clumsy i drop my phone sometimes and some water might got splashed and got in the phone from the speaker holes. is there any way to fix a black screen though :( thanks for reading all the way here!
